text: Sorekara waga shito o, kare-ra no ashiato ni shitagawa se, sarani maruyamu no ko isa o tsukawashi, fukuin o sazuke, mata kare-ra ni shitagau mono no mune ni hakuai to jihi no jo o mota seta. Daga kin'yoku no shudoin-sei wa, kare-ra ga jibun de tsukutta mono de, ware ga kare-ra ni sore o shiji shite wa inai. Arra no yorokobi o etai bakari ni shita kotodaga, kare-ra wa sore mo mamoraneba naranai yo ni wa mamotte inakatta. Sorede ware wa, kare-ra no naka no shinko suru mono ni wa hosho o ataeta. Daga kare-ra no oku no mono wa arra no okite ni somuku-sha-tachideatta
